text: "Holler If Ya Hear Me" is the first single off American rapper 2Pac's second studio album Strictly 4 My N.I.G.G.A.Z.. The song samples the songs "Do It Any Way You Wanna" by People's Choice and "Rebel Without a Pause" by Public Enemy. The song is about frustrations with black poverty, police injustice, and Shakur's perceived harassment from political figure Dan Quayle. The editor of Vibe was quoted in TIME as stating that the song struck a chord with a large section of disaffected youth. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1993 songs Category:Tupac Shakur songs
title: Holler If Ya Hear Me
